pullRequest.title: introduce dependency mediation class
pullRequest.bodyText: @suztomo I think this makes the code for removing excess versions from a classpath somewhat more straightforward. Let me know what you think.

nodes.bodyText: ClosetWinDependencyMediation or FirstOccurrenceDependencyMediation? DependencyMediation is a generic term and this class follows Maven's closest-win way.

It's a bit odd that DependencyMediation class does not have logic to traverse a tree. Because of that, its put and selects interface cannot implement Gradle's highest-win dependency mediation.
(I don't expect this PR to address that concern; just writing down what I felt)
